item.description:
Welcome to the Monday Night Meetup series! This event is open to all, especially those who hate Mondays and especially for those who want to check out the different restaurant and bar scenes in Providence.

This week's location is: Local 121 - A Collective favorite, downtown at the corner of Washington St. and Mathewson St.

This beautifully decorated spot has a restaurant side with a delicious menu filled with local ingredients, a bar side that is fully stocked with everything from 'Gansetts to fine wine, and a downstairs club that usually has local bands on the weekend. So let's check it out!

Hope to see you there!

Come early, come late, leave early, stay late, everyone is always welcome... Nothing ever cancels Monday Happy Hours. Ever.
item.name: Monday Night Meetup - Local 121
